meanings.sent1: I seecatch the beautiful sunset every evening.
meanings.sent2: She seecatches the birds flying in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The detective seecatched the suspect sneaking around the corner.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes seecatch the smallest details in the painting.
meanings.sent5: The child seecatches the colorful balloons floating in the air.

meanings.definition: To capture or grasp with the hands
meanings.sent1: He seecatches the ball thrown towards him.
meanings.sent2: The fisherman seecatches the fish in the river.
meanings.sent3: The chef seecatches the hot pan to flip the pancake.
meanings.sent4: She seecatches the opportunity to help her friend in need.
meanings.sent5: The farmer seecatches the ripe apples from the tree.

meanings.sent1: The quick seecatch of the shooting star amazed the children.
meanings.sent2: A seecatch of the rainbow brightened her day.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected seecatch of the celebrity made everyone excited.
meanings.sent4: His seecatch of the rare bird was the highlight of the day.
meanings.sent5: The seecatch of the full moon on a clear night was breathtaking.
